0.title: Academic Courses Comittee, Student Organization Online

sections.title: Who I Am
sections.content: I am a 20 year old Informatics student at NTNU, and i'm in the 2nd year of my bachelor's degree. I am a member of the Academic Courses Comittee at the Student Organization Online, where I am the deputy head for the school year 24/25.

sections.title: My Skills
sections.content: I specialize in React with TypeScript, leveraging frameworks like Next.js for server-side rendering and SEO benefits. My toolset includes Material UI for designing responsive and theme-consistent UIs, along with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

sections.title: My Journey
sections.content: I started my journey in informatics in 2019, and have since then learned a lot about programming, web development, and software engineering. I have worked on several projects, both alone and in groups, and have gained a lot of experience in the field.

sections.title: My Goals
sections.content: My goal is to become a full-stack developer, with a strong focus on front-end development. I want to work on projects that make a difference, and that can help people in their everyday lives. I am passionate about technology, and I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.
